sentence.Network_en: The content of gibberellin ( GA ) and indole - 3 - acetic acid ( IAA ) in the young - shoot - tips of litchi ( Litchi chinensis Sonn. )

means.word_mean: 1. Chinese tree cultivated especially in Philippines and India for its edible fruit; sometimes placed in genus Nephelium
2. Chinese fruit having a thin brittle shell enclosing a sweet jellylike pulp and a single seed; often dried
